feed.title: Track Awesome Fastapi Updates Daily
feed.subtitle: A curated list of awesome things related to FastAPI

entry.title: Awesome Fastapi Updates on May 18, 2025
entry.content:
Utils / Other Tools

  • FastAPI FastCRUD (⭐1.2k)) - Robust async CRUD operations and flexible endpoint creation utilities.

Articles / Other Tools

  • FastAPI has Ruined Flask Forever for Me

Courses / Other Tools

  • Modern APIs with FastAPI and Python - A course designed to get you creating new APIs running in the cloud with FastAPI quickly.

entry.title: Awesome Fastapi Updates on Mar 15, 2025
entry.content:
Open Source Projects / Other Tools

  • FuturamaAPI (⭐155) - A REST and GraphQL playground built with best practices, providing WebSockets, SSE, callbacks, secret messages, and more.

entry.title: Awesome Fastapi Updates on Jan 31, 2025
entry.content:
Tutorials / Other Tools

  • Async SQLAlchemy with FastAPI - Learn how to use SQLAlchemy asynchronously.
  • Real-time data streaming using FastAPI and WebSockets - Learn how to stream data from FastAPI directly into a real-time chart.
  • Running FastAPI applications in production - Use Gunicorn with systemd for production deployments.
  • Streaming video with FastAPI - Learn how to serve video streams.

PaaS / Other Tools

  • Google App Engine

IaaS / Other Tools

  • Google Compute Engine

Serverless / Other Tools

  • Google Cloud Functions

entry.title: Awesome Fastapi Updates on Jan 17, 2025
entry.content:
Utils / Other Tools

  • FastAPI Listing (⭐55) - A library to design/build listing APIs using component-based architecture, inbuilt query paginator, sorter, django-admin like filters & much more.

entry.title: Awesome Fastapi Updates on Jan 08, 2025
entry.content:
Databases / Query Builders

  • PyPika (⭐2.7k) - A SQL query builder that exposes the full richness of the SQL language.

Utils / Other Tools

  • Apitally (⭐97) - API analytics, monitoring, and request logging for FastAPI.
  • FastAPI Utilities (⭐2.1k) - Reusable utilities: class-based views, response inferring router, periodic tasks, timing middleware, SQLAlchemy session, OpenAPI spec simplification.

Open Source Projects / Other Tools

  • Polar (⭐5.8k) - A funding and monetization platform for developers, built with FastAPI, SQLAlchemy, Alembic, and Arq.

entry.title: Awesome Fastapi Updates on Nov 08, 2024
entry.content:
Boilerplate / Other Tools

  • Uvicorn Poetry FastAPI Project Template (⭐14) - Cookiecutter project template for starting a FastAPI application. Runs in a Docker container with Uvicorn ASGI server on Kubernetes. Supports AMD64 and ARM64 CPU architectures.

Docker Images / Other Tools

  • uvicorn-gunicorn-poetry (⭐45) - Docker image with Gunicorn using Uvicorn workers for running Python web applications. Uses Poetry for managing dependencies and setting up a virtual environment. Supports AMD64 and ARM64 CPU architectures.
  • uvicorn-poetry (⭐53) - Docker image with Uvicorn ASGI server for running Python web applications on Kubernetes. Uses Poetry for managing dependencies and setting up a virtual environment. Supports AMD64 and ARM64 CPU architectures.

entry.title: Awesome Fastapi Updates on Aug 12, 2024
entry.content:
Databases / ORMs

  • Edgy ORM (⭐290) - Complex databases made simple.

Official Resources / Other Tools

  • Source Code (⭐87k) - Hosted on GitHub.

PaaS / Other Tools

  • Deta (example)
  • Fly (tutorial, Deploy from a Git repo (⭐7))
  • Heroku (Step-by-step tutorial, ML model on Heroku tutorial)

Boilerplate / Other Tools

  • Full Stack FastAPI and PostgreSQL - Base Project Generator (⭐34k) - Full Stack FastAPI Template , which includes FastAPI, React, SQLModel, PostgreSQL, Docker, GitHub Actions, automatic HTTPS, and more (developed by the creator of FastAPI, Sebastián Ramírez).

entry.title: Awesome Fastapi Updates on May 02, 2024
entry.content:
Databases / ORMs

  • ormar - Ormar is an async ORM that uses Pydantic validation and can be used directly in FastAPI requests and responses so you are left with only one set of models to maintain. Alembic migrations included.
    • FastAPI Example - Using FastAPI with ormar.
  • Saffier ORM (⭐61) - The only Python ORM you will ever need.

Databases / ODMs

  • Beanie (⭐2.4k) - Asynchronous Python ODM for MongoDB, based on Motor and Pydantic, which supports data and schema migrations out of the box.

Developer Tools / Other Tools

  • FastAPI Cruddy Framework (⭐34) - A companion library to FastAPI designed to bring the development productivity of Ruby on Rails, Ember.js or Sails.js to the FastAPI ecosystem.

Utils / Other Tools

  • FastAPI Lazy (⭐116) - Lazy package to start your project using FastAPI.

Tutorials / Other Tools

  • FastAPI for Flask Users - Learn FastAPI with a side-by-side code comparison to Flask.

Boilerplate / Other Tools

  • Full Stack FastAPI and MongoDB - Base Project Generator (⭐663) - Full stack, modern web application generator, which includes FastAPI, MongoDB, Docker, Celery, React frontend, automatic HTTPS and more.

entry.title: Awesome Fastapi Updates on Dec 21, 2023
entry.content:
Utils / Other Tools

  • FastAPI CloudEvents (⭐35) - CloudEvents integration for FastAPI.

entry.title: Awesome Fastapi Updates on Dec 02, 2023
entry.content:
Tutorials / Other Tools

  • Implementing FastAPI Services – Abstraction and Separation of Concerns - FastAPI application and service structure for a more maintainable codebase.

entry.title: Awesome Fastapi Updates on Jul 22, 2023
entry.content:
Podcasts / Other Tools

  • Build The Next Generation Of Python Web Applications With FastAPI - In this episode of Podcast Init, the creator of FastAPI, Sebastián Ramirez, shares his motivations for building FastAPI and how it works under the hood.

entry.title: Awesome Fastapi Updates on Jul 11, 2023
entry.content:
Admin

  • FastAPI Amis Admin (⭐1.3k) - A high-performance, efficient and easily extensible FastAPI admin framework.

Serverless / Other Tools

  • Vercel - (formerly Zeit) (example (⭐85)).
  • AWS Lambda (example (⭐133))

Open Source Projects / Other Tools

  • FastAPI with Observability (⭐846) - Observe FastAPI app with three pillars of observability: Traces (Tempo), Metrics (Prometheus), Logs (Loki) on Grafana through OpenTelemetry and OpenMetrics.
  • Markdown-Videos (⭐85) - API for generating thumbnails to embed into your markdown content.

entry.title: Awesome Fastapi Updates on Jul 10, 2023
entry.content:
Admin

  • Starlette Admin (⭐809) - Admin framework for FastAPI/Starlette, supporting SQLAlchemy, SQLModel, MongoDB, and ODMantic.

Databases / ODMs

  • ODMantic - AsyncIO MongoDB ODM integrated with Pydantic.

Databases / Other Tools

  • Pydantic-SQLAlchemy (⭐1.3k) - Convert SQLAlchemy models to Pydantic models.

Open Source Projects / Other Tools

  • Bitcart (⭐676) - Platform for merchants, users and developers which offers easy setup and use.

entry.content:

  • Fastapi-SQLA (⭐294) - SQLAlchemy extension for FastAPI with support for pagination, asyncio, and pytest.

entry.content:

Boilerplate / Other Tools

  • fastapi-gino-arq-uvicorn (⭐446) - Template for a high-performance async REST API, in Python. FastAPI + GINO + Arq + Uvicorn (w/ Redis and PostgreSQL).
  • fastapi-alembic-sqlmodel-async (⭐1.1k) - This is a project template which uses FastAPI, Alembic, and async SQLModel as ORM.

entry.content:

entry.title: Awesome Fastapi Updates on Mar 01, 2022
entry.content:
Admin

  • FastAPI Admin (⭐3.3k) - Functional admin panel that provides a user interface for performing CRUD operations on your data. Currently only works with the Tortoise ORM.
  • Piccolo Admin (⭐362) - A powerful and modern admin GUI, using the Piccolo ORM.

entry.title: Awesome Fastapi Updates on Feb 26, 2022
entry.content:
Admin

  • SQLAlchemy Admin (⭐2.2k) - Admin Panel for FastAPI/Starlette that works with SQLAlchemy models.

Utils / Other Tools

  • FastAPI Opentracing (⭐24) - Opentracing middleware and database tracing support for FastAPI.

Official Resources / Other Tools

  • Discord - Chat with other FastAPI users.

Docker Images / Other Tools

  • inboard (⭐200) - Docker images to power your FastAPI apps and help you ship faster.
  • uvicorn-gunicorn-fastapi-docker (⭐2.8k) - Docker image with Uvicorn managed by Gunicorn for high-performance FastAPI web applications in Python 3.7 and 3.6 with performance auto-tuning.

Open Source Projects / Other Tools

  • FastAPI Websocket Broadcast (⭐139) - Websocket 'broadcast' demo.

entry.title: Awesome Fastapi Updates on Dec 28, 2021
entry.content:
Databases / ORMs

  • Prisma Client Python (⭐2k) - An auto-generated, fully type safe ORM powered by Pydantic and tailored specifically for your schema - supports SQLite, PostgreSQL, MySQL, MongoDB, MariaDB and more.
    • FastAPI Example (⭐2k)

Serverless / Other Tools

  • Google Cloud Run (example (⭐199))

entry.title: Awesome Fastapi Updates on Dec 13, 2021
entry.content:
Utils / Other Tools

  • FastAPI Events (⭐502) - Asynchronous event dispatching/handling library for FastAPI and Starlette.

entry.title: Awesome Fastapi Updates on Dec 11, 2021
entry.content:
Auth

  • AuthX (⭐957) - Customizable Authentications and Oauth2 management for FastAPI.
  • FastAPI Security (⭐154) - Implements authentication and authorization as dependencies in FastAPI.

Utils / Other Tools

  • ASGI Correlation ID (⭐500) - Request ID logging middleware.
  • FastAPI Cache (⭐1.6k) - A tool to cache FastAPI response and function results, with support for Redis, Memcached, DynamoDB, and in-memory backends.

Tutorials / Other Tools

  • Getting started with GraphQL in Python with FastAPI and Ariadne - Generate a FullStack playground using FastAPI, GraphQL and Ariadne.

entry.title: Awesome Fastapi Updates on Oct 03, 2021
entry.content:
Utils / Other Tools

  • Strawberry GraphQL (⭐4.3k) - Python GraphQL library based on dataclasses.

entry.title: Awesome Fastapi Updates on Sep 13, 2021
entry.content:
Auth

  • FastAPI Azure Auth (⭐537) - Azure AD authentication for your APIs with single and multi tenant support.
  • FastAPI Users (⭐5.4k) - Account management, authentication, authorization.

Boilerplate / Other Tools

  • FastAPI template (⭐2.3k) - Flexible, lightweight FastAPI project generator. It includes support for SQLAlchemy, multiple databases, CI/CD, Docker, and Kubernetes.

Open Source Projects / Other Tools

  • Bunnybook (⭐301) - A tiny social network built with FastAPI, React+RxJs, Neo4j, PostgreSQL, and Redis.

entry.title: Awesome Fastapi Updates on Sep 11, 2021
entry.content:
Databases / ORMs

  • Tortoise ORM - An easy-to-use asyncio ORM (Object Relational Mapper) inspired by Django.
    • FastAPI Example - An example of the Tortoise-ORM FastAPI integration.
    • Tutorial: Setting up Tortoise ORM with FastAPI
    • Aerich (⭐944) - Tortoise ORM migrations tools.
  • SQLModel - SQLModel (which is powered by Pydantic and SQLAlchemy) is a library for interacting with SQL databases from Python code, with Python objects.

Open Source Projects / Other Tools

  • Universities (⭐69) - API service for obtaining information about +9600 universities worldwide.

entry.title: Awesome Fastapi Updates on Aug 27, 2021
entry.content:
Videos / Other Tools

  • Building a Stock Screener with FastAPI - A you build a web-based stock screener with FastAPI, you'll be introduced to many of FastAPI's features, including Pydantic models, dependency injection, background tasks, and SQLAlchemy integration.

entry.content:

  • JeffQL (⭐31) - Simple authentication and login API using GraphQL and JWT.

entry.content:

entry.title: Awesome Fastapi Updates on Jan 23, 2021

  • FastAPI MQTT (⭐285) - An extension for the MQTT protocol.

entry.content:

entry.content:
Email / Other Tools

  • FastAPI Mail (⭐813) - Lightweight mail system for sending emails and attachments (individual and bulk).

entry.title: Awesome Fastapi Updates on Sep 23, 2020
entry.content:
Auth

  • FastAPI Simple Security (⭐373) - Out-of-the-box API key security manageable through path operations.

entry.title: Awesome Fastapi Updates on Jul 28, 2020
entry.content:
Utils / Other Tools

  • FastAPI Cache (⭐222) - A simple lightweight cache system.

entry.title: Awesome Fastapi Updates on Jul 06, 2020
entry.content:
Databases / Other Tools

  • FastAPI-CamelCase - CamelCase JSON support for FastAPI utilizing Pydantic.
    • CamelCase Models with FastAPI and Pydantic - Accompanying blog post from the author of the extension.

entry.title: Awesome Fastapi Updates on Jul 01, 2020
entry.content:
Databases / ODMs

  • MongoEngine - A Document-Object Mapper (think ORM, but for document databases) for working with MongoDB from Python.

Developer Tools / Other Tools

  • msgpack-asgi (⭐173) - Automatic MessagePack content negotiation.

Official Resources / Other Tools

  • Tutorial - Official tutorial showing you how to use FastAPI with most of its features, step by step.

Podcasts / Other Tools

  • FastAPI on PythonBytes - Nice overview of the project.

Tutorials / Other Tools

  • Porting Flask to FastAPI for ML Model Serving - Comparison of Flask vs FastAPI.
  • Serving Machine Learning Models with FastAPI in Python - Use FastAPI to quickly and easily deploy and serve machine learning models in Python as a RESTful API.

Talks / Other Tools

  • PyConBY 2020: Serve ML models easily with FastAPI - From the talk by Sebastian Ramirez you will learn how to easily build a production-ready web (JSON) API for your ML models with FastAPI, including best practices by default.
  • PyCon UK 2019: FastAPI from the ground up - This talk shows how to build a simple REST API for a database from the ground up using FastAPI.

Videos / Other Tools

  • Building Web APIs Using FastAPI - Use FastAPI to build a web application programming interface (RESTful API).
  • FastAPI - A Web Framework for Python - See how to do numeric validations with FastAPI.
  • Serving Machine Learning Models As API with FastAPI - Build a machine learning API with FastAPI.

Boilerplate / Other Tools

  • FastAPI and Tortoise ORM (⭐138) - Powerful but simple template for web APIs w/ FastAPI (as web framework) and Tortoise-ORM (for working via database without headache).
  • cookiecutter-fastapi (⭐570) - Cookiecutter template for FastAPI projects using: Machine Learning, Poetry, Azure Pipelines and pytest.
  • FastAPI and React Template (⭐2.4k) - Full stack cookiecutter boilerplate using FastAPI, TypeScript, Docker, PostgreSQL, and React.

Open Source Projects / Other Tools

  • FastAPI with Celery, RabbitMQ, and Redis (⭐558) - Minimal example utilizing FastAPI and Celery with RabbitMQ for task queue, Redis for Celery backend, and Flower for monitoring the Celery tasks.
  • JSON-RPC Server (⭐317) - JSON-RPC server based on FastAPI.
  • redis-streams-fastapi-chat (⭐247) - A simple Redis Streams backed chat app using Websockets, Asyncio and FastAPI/Starlette.
  • TermPair (⭐1.6k) - View and control terminals from your browser with end-to-end encryption.

entry.title: Awesome Fastapi Updates on Jun 14, 2020
entry.content:
Boilerplate / Other Tools

  • FastAPI Nano (⭐937) - Simple FastAPI template with factory pattern architecture.

entry.title: Awesome Fastapi Updates on Jun 09, 2020
entry.content:
Auth

  • FastAPI Auth (⭐166) - Pluggable auth that supports the OAuth2 Password Flow with JWT access and refresh tokens.
  • FastAPI Permissions (⭐542) - Row-level permissions.

Databases / ORMs

  • FastAPI SQLAlchemy (⭐656) - Simple integration between FastAPI and SQLAlchemy.
  • ORM (⭐1.8k) - An async ORM.

Databases / Query Builders

  • asyncpgsa (⭐419) - A wrapper around asyncpg (⭐7.4k) for use with SQLAlchemy Core.
  • Databases (⭐3.9k) - Async SQL query builder that works on top of the SQLAlchemy Core expression language.

Databases / ODMs

  • Motor - Asynchronous Python driver for MongoDB.

Developer Tools / Other Tools

  • FastAPI Client Generator (⭐340) - Generate a mypy- and IDE-friendly API client from an OpenAPI spec.
  • FastAPI Versioning (⭐721) - API versioning.
  • Jupyter Notebook REST API (⭐82) - Run your Jupyter notebooks as RESTful API endpoints.

Utils / Other Tools

  • FastAPI Contrib (⭐638) - Opinionated set of utilities: pagination, auth middleware, permissions, custom exception handlers, MongoDB support, and Opentracing middleware.
  • FastAPI Plugins (⭐469) - Redis and Scheduler plugins.
  • FastAPI ServiceUtils (⭐33) - Generator for creating API services.
  • Prerender Python Starlette (⭐16) - Starlette middleware for Prerender.
  • SlowApi (⭐1.5k) - Rate limiter (based on Flask-Limiter).
  • Starlette Exporter (⭐319) - One more prometheus integration for FastAPI and Starlette.

Official Resources / Other Tools

  • Documentation - Comprehensive documentation.

Courses / Other Tools

  • Test-Driven Development with FastAPI and Docker - Learn how to build, test, and deploy a text summarization microservice with Python, FastAPI, and Docker.

Boilerplate / Other Tools

  • FastAPI Model Server Skeleton (⭐471) - Skeleton app to serve machine learning models production-ready.
  • cookiecutter-spacy-fastapi (⭐533) - Quick deployments of spaCy models with FastAPI.
  • Pywork (⭐11) - Yeoman generator to scaffold a FastAPI app.

Open Source Projects / Other Tools

  • Dispatch (⭐5.9k) - Manage security incidents.
  • Mailer (⭐61) - Dead-simple mailer micro-service for static websites.
  • Sprites as a service (⭐312) - Generate your personal 8-bit avatars using Cellular Automata.
  • Slackers (⭐78) - Slack webhooks API.

entry.title: Awesome Fastapi Updates on Jun 08, 2020
